title: Riot Please help!
body: ok so i bought a riot 20euro card since im in europe this year but my account is from NA and i just wasted 20 euro i was hoping you can help in some way please ( ik its only 20 bucks but still the shop is open and i really want new skins){{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Send in a ticket to player support.  They should be able to work something out =)
Hover "Explore league" in the top left of this page then on the dropdown click "support"

(note that it can take roughly 2 days to get a response; be patient they will get to you)
{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Shouldn't take that long on NA.  All of our teams had a higher volume due to personalized shop issues, but we're mostly recovered now and back in full force.
Very happy to hear that Porocles!  You guys work fast.{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

RP Cards are region specific, so it wouldn't be possible to use an EU card on NA.  Our billing team might be able to make an exception in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for you, but be super careful about the card you buy in the future!
